GitHub Actions adds Managed GPU Runners for ML Workflows
github.com

GitHub is making it easier to run large language models and other ML tasks by introducing managed GPU runners for Actions, eliminating the need for self-hosted infrastructure.

PUBLISHED: FEB 23TOPIC: DEVOPSEST TIME: 5 MINS
